contextId.information: You can translate with "because" to show how these two statements relate. AT: "Watch out for people because they will" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_connectingwords]])

contextId.information: You can add "because" to clarify why people should fear God. AT: "fear God because he is able" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_connectingwords]])
This statement explains why the Queen of the South will condemn Jesus' generations. AT: "For she came" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_connectingwords]])
